247244.「へへ～ どうどう？\n イカスでしょ！: Heh heh~ What do you think? Isn't he cute?

247245.「ペーペーのアタシだけど 見た目だけなら\n 熟練のデスマスターに 見えるっしょ:
I may be a novice, but I look like a seasoned
death master, don't I! First of all, I have to
start with the "look".

247246.「ヤバッ……今さら キンチョーしてきたし！\n 戦う以上 無傷じゃ すまされない:
Oh no... now I'm getting kinky! I can't go
through this fight unscathed, can I? Worst
case scenario, I might die...

247247.「でも アタシら デスマスターは\n 死なないんだっけ？\n ん？ あれ こんな:
But we death masters don't die, do we?
Hmm? Hey, where did you get this...

247249.「ウッソだー！！ 死なない人間なんて\n いるわけないじゃん。:
It's Uso! How can there be a human being who
doesn't die?

247250.「うふふ……わたくしたちには\n 死を乗りこえる チカラがあるのよ。: We have the power to survive death.

247251.「じゃあ アタシも デスマスターになる！: Then I'll be a death master!

247252.「ダメよぅ。だって あなたの霊感を\n 封じなければ ならないから……。: No. Because I have to seal your psychic...

247253.「おっかしいの……。こんなときだってのに\n 昔の記憶が よみがえってきたよ。:
I'm surprised... even at a time like this, old
memories are coming back to me.

247254.「デズ師匠いわく デスマスターは\n 死を乗りこえるチカラが あるんだってさ。:
Master Dez says that death masters have the
power to overcome death.

247255.「だから 行こう <cs_pchero>！\n ギス野郎に 天誅を食らわせよーぜ:
So let's go. Let's put that son of a bitch to
death! We're going to get revenge on someone
who took care of us.

247273.「おかえりなさい <pc>さん。\n あら？ ネリムちゃんの姿が見えないけど\n:
Welcome back <pc>. Oh? I don't see
you here, Nelim.

247274.「よかった 無事なのね……ほっとしたわ～。: Thank God you're okay...I'm so relieved!

247275.「戦い慣れてない ネリムちゃんを守りながら\n ギスマイヤーと戦うのは\n さぞ:
It must have been very difficult to fight
Gismeyer while protecting Nelim, who is not
used to fighting.

247276.「ありがとうね <pc>さん。\n こちら わたくしからの 感謝の気持ちよ。\n:
Thank you <pc>. Here is a token of my
appreciation. Please accept it.

247277.「たっだいまー！ いえ～い！\n デズ師匠のカタキ とってきたよー！: I'm back! Yes! I got Master Dez's sword!

247278.「お疲れさま ネリムちゃん。\n 活躍っぷりは <pc>さんから\n うかがって:
Good job, Nelim. I've been hearing about your
success from <pc>. I'd give you a
hundred points!

247279.「思ったより 楽勝だったよ。\n 死霊の書も……はい！ このとーり！:
It was easier than I thought it would be. And
the Book of Dead... yes! Just like that!

247280.「この死霊の書が 二度と 人手に渡らぬよう\n 厳重に 管理していかないとね。\:
We have to make sure that this Book of Dead
never falls into the wrong hands again. Well,
I don't know what to do...

247282.「どうせ 悪用されるだけだし\n こんなモン この世にないほうが いいよ。:
It's better that this kind of thing doesn't
exist in this world, because it will be abused
anyway.

247286.「あらためまして <pc> デズ師匠！\n これからも アタシら ３人で\n デ:
Greetings <pc>, Master Dez! Let's
keep up the good work in the deathmath
business, the three of us!

247288.「え？ ちょっとちょっと 何よ。\n リアクション うすいんですケド。:
What? Hey, hey, what is it? Your reaction is
weak.

247289.「ネリムちゃん……わたくしが 幽霊として\n 存在している理由を 考えてみて。: Nelim...think about why I exist as a ghost.

247290.「それはね この世に 未練があったからよ。\n 死霊の書を 取り戻せなかった……:
It's because I had regrets in this world. I
couldn't get the Book of Dead back I couldn't
protect you.

247291.「だけど もう…………\n あなたを ねらう者が現れる心配は\n ないでしょう。:
But now you don't have to worry about anyone
coming after you. I have no regrets.

247293.「身体がないまま 現世に とどまるのは\n とてもとても つらいことなのよ。:
It is very, very hard to stay in this world
without a body.

247294.「そんな言い方 ずるいよぉ。: It's not fair to talk like that.

247295.「ネリムちゃん <pc>さん。\n 今まで 本当に ありがとう……。\n ふたり:
Nelim <pc>. Thank you so much for
everything you've done for me... send my soul
to both of you.

247296.「知ってるかしら？ デスマスターは死なないの。\n 死をも 乗りこえるのよ。あの:
Did you know... Death masters don't die. They
survive death. He'll be watching over you both
in the afterlife.

247297.「ウソばっかし！\n 死なない人間なんて いないし\n 幽霊だって 消えたら そ:
You're full of lies! There is no such thing as
a human being who never dies, and even ghosts
disappear and are never seen again.

247298.「あらあら～ お尻の青い ヒヨコちゃんが\n ウソだと 言いきってしまうの？\n:
Oh dear~ You're going to tell a lie about a
blue-bottomed chick? I wonder where that
confidence comes from.

247299.「真実は 死んだデスマスターにしか\n わからないのよ。もっともっと 修行して\:
Only a dead death master can know the truth.
Train harder and aim higher, little Nelim.

247300.「ほとんど 遺言じゃん……断れないし。: It's almost like a will...I can't say no.

247301.「わかった！ アタシらで 師匠を送る。\n やろう <pc>！:
Okay! We'll send Master. Let's do it
<pc>!

247302.「ふたりとも もう いいわ。旅立てそうよ。\n 今まで 本当に……ありがとうね。:
You're both good to go. We're ready to go.
Thank you so much for everything.

247303.「アタシが生きてるのは 師匠のおかげ。\n 守ってくれて ありがとぉ！:
I'm alive because of you. Thank you for
protecting me!

247305.「あ～あ……アタシも 晴れて\n デスマスターになれたし ３人で\n 仕事を続け:
Ahhh...I thought I could become a death master
after all, and the three of us could continue
working together.

247306.「でも あきらめたワケじゃないよ！ \n アタシ デズ師匠の遺言どおり\n もっ:
But I'm not giving up! I'm going to follow
Master Dez's will and train even harder to be
the best I can be!

247307.「んで 名の知れた デスマスターになって\n いつか 探偵事務所を ひらくんだ。:
Then I'll become a famous death master, and one day I'll open my own detective agency. And then I'll be the boss and you'll be my
assistant.

247309.「ごきげんよう ネリムちゃん。\n お仕事のほうは 順調そうね。:
Good day to you, Nelim. Your work seems to be
going well.

247310.「わたくし あの世で 元気にやってるわよ～。: I'm doing fine in the afterlife.

247311.「ふふっ 言ったでしょ？\n デスマスターは 死なないって。:
Hmm. I told you, didn't I? Death masters don't
die.

247313.「書を奪おうとも ムダだッ！\n 死霊の復活は 止まらんよ！:
You can't take the book away from me! The
spirits of the dead will never stop!

247314.「聞け！ 死霊たちよ！\n この者から 死霊の書を取りあげよ！:
Hark! Attention, mortals! Take the Book of
Dead from him!

247315.「どうした！？ 我が命に 従え！: What's the matter? Obey my command!

247317.「はなせッ！ 私は お前たちの王だぞ！: Let go! I am your king!

247318.「へへ～ん 書を 奪ったのは\n ムダじゃなかったようだねぇ。:
Hehe~ Looks like the book robbery wasn't a
waste of time.

247319.「さてと……こいつを封印する方法は\n デズ師匠から 教えてもらったんだけど\n:
Well...Master Dez taught me how to seal this
thing, but it won't stop summoning...what
should I do?

247320.「むき～ 考えても わからんし\n とりあえず 後回し 後回し！\n 今は こい:
I don't know what to think, so we'll just put
it off for now, put it off, put it off! What's
important right now is sealing him up!

247322.「やっべ 召喚 止まってやんの！\n アタシら ツイてるじゃん！: Oh, no! Summoning stopped! We're so lucky!

247323.「でも この子たちは 消えてくんないかぁ……。: But these kids will just disappear...

247324.「そーだ！ <cs_pchero>！\n いっしょに お祈りして 昇天させよう。:
That's right! <cs_pchero>! Let's pray
together and ascend.

247325.「ぐはぁ！ やめろぉー！！ はなせッ！: Aaah! No! Let go of me!

247326.「大好きな死体に 囲まれて\n あの世で 幸せに暮らせよな～★:
Let them live happily ever after, surrounded
by their favorite corpses.

247327.「デスマスターとしての 初仕事\n これにて完了っと！ 幸先いいじゃん アタシ！:
My first job as death master is complete! What
a good start, me!

247328.「そんじゃ <cs_pchero>。\n デズ師匠のうちに 帰ろっか。:
Well then <cs_pchero>. Let's go back to
Master Dez's house.

247740.<cs_pchero>と ネリムは ヘドロの沼地を後にし\nグレン領東へ 帰った:
<cs_pchero> and Nelim left Sludge Swamp and
returned to Glen East...

249949.「ちょっと ちょっと 見て見て！\n チャンスじゃん！ こっちに気づいてないよ。:
Hey, hey, hey! Look, look, look! Look at the
opportunity! They haven't noticed us. Let's
finish this quickly.

249950.「よし！ アタシが 先 しかけっから\n <cs_pchero>は あとから つ:
Okay, I'll do it first. I'll go first, then
you follow.

249951.「おや？ 誰かと思えば ネリム君か！？\n それに <cs_pchero>君まで:
Oh? Look who it is, Nelim! And <cs_pchero>
too!

249952.「なんともはや……キミたちは\n 死んだものとばかり 思っていたのに\n がっか:
What a disappointing reunion...I thought you
were dead.

249953.「お前に チャンスを くれてやんよ。\n おとなしく 死霊の書を渡すなら\n 全:
I'll give you a chance. If you give me the
Book of Dead quietly, I'll give you a full
recovery of about two months.

249954.「ハハン。お断りだねぇ。: Hahan. I guess I'll have to decline.

249956.「これで カケラの罪悪感もなく\n アンタを沼に 沈めてやれるじゃんよォ。:
Now I can drown you in the swamp without a
shred of guilt.

249957.「フフフ……フハハハハ！\n 弱い犬ほど よく吠えるねぇ！ 空を見たまえ！:
Huff, puff...hahahahahaha! Weak dogs bark more
often! Look to the sky!

249958.「昼でありながら もっとも 闇が濃い。\n あの世と この世の境界が あいまいに:
It is dark even though it's daytime. The boundary between the afterlife and this world becomes blurred, making this the perfect time
to Summon the spirits of the dead.

249959.「ここはね ガテリア皇国と ウルベア帝国という\n 古代の大国同士が 覇権をかけ:
This is a cursed land where the ancient powers
of Gateria and Urbea Empire fought for
supremacy.

249960.「ゆえに！ 私たちの足元には 大量の死者が\n 眠っているッ！ 今 死霊の書を使:
Therefore! A great number of the dead lie at
our feet! If we use the Book of Dead now, many
of them will come back to life!

249961.「そして 私だけの 死霊の王国が誕生する！:
And my very own kingdom of the dead will be
born!

249962.「あー はいはい。アタシ むずかしーことは\n わかんないんだわー。でも アンタ:
Ah, yes, yes. I don't know anything
complicated. But I could tell that you really
want to sink into the swamp.

249964.「フフフフ……こちらには 数のチカラがある。\n 召喚の儀は とっくに 終わって:
We have the power of numbers. The summoning
ceremony was over long ago.

249965.「さあ キミたちも 我が国の民として\n 迎えいれて やろうじゃないか！！: Come, let us welcome you as our people!
